implementation_steps.details: Create new scenario ‚Üí Import blueprint ‚Üí Connect Buffer accounts
Replace {{IG_PROFILE_ID}}, {{LI_PROFILE_ID}}, etc. with actual Buffer profile IDs
Send test webhook with different emotional content to verify adaptations
Track how different emotions perform across platforms

expected_results.engagement_increase: 40-60% higher engagement due to emotional relevance
expected_results.platform_optimization: Each platform gets content that feels native and emotionally appropriate
expected_results.community_building: Stronger community connection through empathy and validation
expected_results.cultural_sensitivity: Content adapted for specific cultural contexts
expected_results.emotional_support: Users feel understood and supported in their journey
